com.linkedin.parseq.promise

Class FastFailCountDownPromiseListener<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.parseq.promise.FastFailCountDownPromiseListener<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PromiseListener<T>

    public class FastFailCountDownPromiseListener<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PromiseListener<T>
    Sets a value on a SettablePromise after this listener has been notified of a specified number of promise resolutions. If one of promises has been resolved with failure then SettablePromise will be resolved immediately with that failure.
    Author:
    Jaroslaw Odzga (jodzga@linkedin.com)

    • Constructor Summary
